means: 等候领救济食品的队伍

sentence.Network_en: We lived on the breadline to get our son through college.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了供儿子读完大学，我们生活非常拮据。

sentence.Network_en: They're not exactly on the breadline.
sentence.Network_cn: 严格说来他们并没有处于赤贫状态。

sentence.Network_en: Breadline Africa does incredible, valuable work, especially among orphans and Aids - affected children in Southern Africa.
sentence.Network_cn: Breadline非洲确实令人难以置信的, 有价值的工作, 特别是孤儿和艾滋病,影响南部非洲儿童.

list.abs: ...直译是“在等候领施舍食物的队伍里”。据说，在十九世纪七十年代的纽约，有一家颇有名气的维也纳式面包店。On the breadline 极其贫困，（生活仅够糊口）春秋时齐国发生饥荒，一位善心人黔敖在路边设饭摊施舍饮食，他对一位饥民说：“嗟！来食！&r.

entry.tran: 等候领取救济食品的队伍；赤贫线
entry.def: Someone who is on the breadline is very poor indeed.

example.ex: We lived on the breadline to get our son through college...
example.tran: 为了供儿子读完大学，我们生活非常拮据。

example.ex: They're not exactly on the breadline.
example.tran: 严格说来他们并没有处于赤贫状态。

means.word_mean: 1. a queue of people waiting for free food

sentences.en: Most of the unemployed in this area are on the breadline.
sentences.cn: 这一地区的失业人口大多数都十分贫困。
